scripts.seed: npx prisma db push --force-reset && NODE_ENV=development ts-node ./src/seeders/seeder-dev.ts
scripts.commit: npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push
scripts.pre-build-seed: npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push --force-reset && ts-node ./src/seeders/seeder-dev.ts
scripts.docker:test: sudo docker compose -f docker/compose.yml -f docker/compose.test.yml --env-file=.env --env-file=.env.test up --build
scripts.docker:dev-seed: sudo docker compose -f docker/compose.yml -f docker/compose.dev.yml -f docker/compose.dev.seed.yml --env-file=.env up --build
scripts.docker:dev: sudo docker compose -f docker/compose.yml -f docker/compose.dev.yml --env-file=.env  up  --build
scripts.docker:prod: sudo docker compose -f docker/compose.yml -f docker/compose.prod.yml up --build
